snippet: Three other people were injured when a Ford Expedition jumped a curb at an intersection and plowed into a group of pedestrians.
abstract: Sport utility vehicle jumps curb at intersection in Fort Greene, Brooklyn, killing 9-year-old boy and injuring three others; identities of driver and victims are withheld pending investigation.
lead_paragraph: Three other people were injured when a Ford Expedition jumped a curb at an intersection and plowed into a group of pedestrians.

headline.main: Boy, 9, Is Killed by S.U.V. in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Boy, 9, Is Killed by S.U.V. in Brooklyn
